About Sandbox Contact
Custom
Cursor-JS

Custom Cursor JS is an open-source JavaScript library for facilitating the development of custom cursors on the web. For the project I also designed and built accompanying sites to showcase possible usages and capabilities of the package.
Visit Site

The Process

Open-source packages are the lifeblood of development communities. They abstract away monotonous tasks and enable the community to build projects faster and with less hassle. I had always been intrigued by learning how to write packages so I gave it a shot with Custom Cursor JS.

and enhance the user
experience and interactions
